short_summary: Purchase of APC/Schneider or equivalent UPS Battery Replacement for Shared Services Canada. Amendment 001 raises several issues including extending the solicitation closing time to 14 May 2024. Changes to be observed include the requirement for Canadian bidders to register in the SSC P2P portal.
description: This solicitation is for the purchase of APC/Schneider or equivalent UPS Battery Replacement for Shared Services Canada.  This Solicitation Amendment #001 is raised to:  Publish Canada’s Responses to suppliers questions  Extend the solicitation closing time to: May 14, 2024 Bidders can register in the SSC P2P portal in order to: a. view and access solicitations from SSC; b. submit a response to a solicitation; c. receive updates and amendments regarding solicitations; d. be awarded contracts and receive contract amendments; and e. submit invoices and receive payment status updates.
full_summary:
## Request for Proposal - APC/Schneider or Equivalent UPS Battery Replacement
### Solicitation ID: SSC-24-00026235: T

#### Amendment Number: 1
Published: April 22, 2024
Closing Date: May 14, 2024 @ 14:00:00

#### Summary

Shared Services Canada invites bidders to submit a response to this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the purchase of APC/Schneider or equivalent UPS battery replacement for its Shared Services Canada operation.

#### Tender Details
- **Brief Description:** The bidder is expected to provide replacement batteries for the APC/Schneider or equivalent UPS systems.
- **Pre-Qualification Criteria:** Identify what makes a bidder eligible to participate in the procurement.
- **Trade Agreements:** This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
- **Delivery Locations: Quebec (except NCR)**

#### Important Dates
- **Publication Date:** April 22, 2024
- **Amendment Date:** May 3, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date:** May 14, 2024 @ 14:00:00

#### Contact Information

Javier Ventura
343-576-9329

Attachments

- [Link to document]

- [Link to document]

No link is provided for the notice URL, as the raw text seems to indicate that it was left blank. It is assumed that the procurement portal should be used instead.

#### Registration

Bidders can register on the SSC P2P portal to access the solicitation details and submit their responses. For more information, visit [supplier registration page](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login).
